Model

Class WindFarmLayoutEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.WindFarmLayoutEvaluator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KusiakLayoutEvaluator

    public abstract class WindFarmLayoutEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    The class WindFarmLayoutEvaluator is an interface to easily exchange the evaluation function of the wind farm layouts. The evaluator has to be initialized with a wind scenario before being used to evaluate any layouts with the evaluation function. After evaluation, the output data (energy output per turbine, per direction, etc.) are available by the means of the corresponding getters. Each time the evaluation function is used, a global counter is increased. This counter is available with the function getNumberOfEvaluation.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public abstract double evaluate(double[][] layout)
        2015 WIND FARM LAYOUT OPTIMIZATION EVALUATION FUNCTION Evaluates a given layout and returns its cost of energy Calling this method increases the number of evaluations counter.
        Parameters:
        layout - The layout to evaluate
        Returns:
        the cost of energy (positive) and max_double if the layout is invalid

      • getEnergyOutputs

        public abstract double[][] getEnergyOutputs()
        Returns the energy outputs per wind turbine and per direction of the last layout evaluated, ordered as in the layout vector provided to the evaluation method and the wind scenario wind directions. A layout must have been evaluated before this method is called. This method doesn't increase the number of evaluation counter.
        Returns:
        The energy outputs; null if no layout have been evaluated

      • getTurbineFitnesses

        public abstract double[] getTurbineFitnesses()
        Returns the wake free ratio per wind turbine of the last layout evaluated, ordered as in the layout vector provided in the evaluation method. A layout must have been evaluated before this method is called. This method doesn't increase the number of evaluation counter.
        Returns:
        The wake free ratio per turbine

      • getEnergyOutput

        public abstract double getEnergyOutput()
        Returns the global energy output of the last layout evaluated. A layout must have been evaluated before this method is called. This method doesn't increase the number of evaluation counter.
        Returns:
        The global energy output

      • getWakeFreeRatio

        public abstract double getWakeFreeRatio()
        Returns the global wake free ratio of the last layout evaluated. A layout must have been evaluated before this method is called. This method doesn't increase the number of evaluation counter.
        Returns:
        The global wake free ratio

      • getEnergyCost

        public abstract double getEnergyCost()
        Returns the energy cost of the last layout evaluated. A layout must have been evaluated before this method is called. This method doesn't increase the number of evaluation counter.
        Returns:
        The energy cost

      • getNumberOfEvaluation

        public static int getNumberOfEvaluation()
        Returns the global number of time the evaluation function has been called.

      • checkConstraint

        public abstract boolean checkConstraint(double[][] layout)
        Check if a layout violate or not the constraints of a wind farm. It checks: - no turbine violates the security distance - no turbine is out of the farm - no turbine is inside an obstacle This function does not increase the evaluation counter.
        Parameters:
        layout - The layout to check

      • getTurbineRadius

        public abstract double getTurbineRadius()
        Returns the radius of one turbine

        public abstract double getFarmWidth()
        Returns the farm width

      • getObstacles

        public abstract double[][] getObstacles()
        Return the obstacles of the farm
        Returns:
        an array of [xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax] for each obstacle.
